room_title: Escape room "Coffee Cartel" by Lakeland Escape Room in Lakeland
room_description:
Your family owns and operates a profitable coffee plantation in the mountains of Colombia, South America. Tourists from all over the world frequent your Finca –Hotel, Las Tres Ana’s, on the plantation. What these tourists and authorities do not know, until now, is your true hidden business.
The coffee is just a front to the secret emerald mine you have underground. You have been making millions exporting your precious Emeralds. The authorities are on their way to arrest you and put you away for a long, long time… Unless you can find your way out before they arrive!
